file_content.text: You don't understand. This isn't just my shop, it's my home!
As I've explained, the Empire is appropriating all privately owned buildings for military use.
If we are to keep the people of Balmorra safe during this transition, we need your cooperation.
But I've lived in Sobrik my whole life. Everything I have is here.
And the Empire has compensated you accordingly. It's time you move on.
